scripts.start: yarn run tsc && yarn run backpack-cli && echo "--- START PROGRAM ---" && node src/main
scripts.build: mkdir -v Build || true; yarn run tsc && yarn run backpack-cli && yarn run webpack --progress --no-stats && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && cp .bin/bin/node Build/ytmpv && yarn run postject Build/ytmpv NODE_SEA_BLOB Build/ytmpv.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.clean: find ./src -name "*.js" -type f | while read file; do rm -v "$file"; done; rm -v Build/ytmpv.blob || true;
scripts.package: yarn install && yarn run build && yarn run clean
